blog.name: itismarvelicious
blog.title: Qu'est-ce que j'irais faire au paradis ?
blog.description: French. 25. | Fixing Avengers: Endgame here. | I take prompts. | Pepperony mainly.

summary: Hey what if Tony's dying speech to Pepper isn't at the beginning of the movie like we suppose it is, when he's trying to come...
body:
Hey what if Tony’s dying speech to Pepper isn’t at the beginning of the movie like we suppose it is, when he’s trying to come back to Earth with Nebula, but what if it’s towards the end of the movie? What if he isn’t with Nebula, just alone, drifting in space after sacrificing himself?

A horrible thought, I know

summary: peter parker would do the trashtag challenge and would just take a picture of himself because he is gen z like that lolololol...
body:
peter parker would do the trashtag challenge and would just take a picture of himself because he is gen z like that lolololol

Peter: did you see my contribution to the trashtag challenge? *shows tony his phone*

Tony: thats just a picture of you

Peter: i know!! now i need to remove myself from the planet to rid of my trashyness

Tony: nope! you are not leaving this planet again!!! not on my watch!

title: New Year's Eve
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CkHNal

by TariTheNurse

Your life took a turn for the better when you became an Avenger. They are your friends. Team mates. They make your life better and your smile brighter…and one makes a potentially simpler life harder than you had planned.

Words: 2700, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, James “Bucky” Barnes, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Pepper Potts
  • Relationships: Sam Wilson/Original Female Character, Sam Wilson/Reader
  • Additional Tags: Mutual Pining, Fluff, Drinking, Smut, New Year’s Eve, Pining


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CkHNal

title: Penny at homecoming
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TChGpX

by Van1lj

Penny was sitting on top of Cyclone, she was waiting for Happy, she wanted to make sure that the Vulture diden´t get away. she knew he woulden´t but
rather safe then sorry. Her hands where so burnt it was kinda scary, the smell was not very pelsent,but everything hurt so her hands dident feel
anyworse then the rest of her.she snapt out of her thoghts when she hered
all the cars pulling up on the beatch. When she saw Happy standing intront of the Valture,she decided it was time for her to leave. she swingde her way
home, she crashde into a coupele of wals here and there, but she got home in relativly one pice. she throw all her chlose into a drawer and just feel assleep.
She can deal with everything tomoroww.

There are probably a lot of typos in here. English is my 4th language and im drunk hehehheh
(This is also not done btw)

Words: 1172, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Happy Hogan, Ned Leeds, Adrian Toomes
  • Additional Tags: Female Peter Parker, Post-Spider-Man: Homecoming, The Vulture - Freeform, Peter Parker Needs a Hug, Tony Needs a Hug, Protective Tony Stark, Tired Peter Parker, she is also grumpy, she is a tired grump, burns on hands are the FUCKING worst

summary: Carol, familiar with Howard Stark because he was a literal celebrity when she lived on earth and had left earth when he died:...
body:
Carol, familiar with Howard Stark because he was a literal celebrity when she lived on earth and had left earth when he died: “So Tony, how’s your dad?”

Tony:

Nat:

Bruce:

Clint:

Scott:

Doctor Strange’s Astral Form:

Thor: ?

Nebula: ?

Rocket: ?

Steve: *whispers in Carol’s ear*

Carol: OwO

summary:
AO3 User: Morphiina 
Fic Name: Infested: Ghost of the Past 
Pairing: Tony Stark/Loki 
Rating: Explicit  Status: Complete...
caption:
AO3 User: Morphiina
Fic Name: Infested: Ghost of the Past
Pairing: Tony Stark/Loki
Rating: Explicit 
Status: Complete

Description: It’s been years since Tony Stark, now a special task force marine of the Terran SHIELD corps, had seen or heard from Loki. But now, with the rising threat of alien invasion becoming critical, Tony finds himself reunited with his old highschool love interest; now a fully-fledged stealth operative; as they are assigned a dangerous mission together. 

But not everything is as it seems, and it wouldn’t take much for this dangerous mission to go horribly, horribly wrong.

Part 1 of 2

blog.title: Come In We Have Starker
blog.description: Claudia | she/her | I love RDJ 4000 | Starker is my jam | Marvel nerd af

summary: Iron Dad and Spider Son: Kindergarten Adventures
title: Iron Dad and Spider Son: Kindergarten Adventures
body:
These are just some headcanons from my collection of headcanons that never made it into a real fanfiction because I am a lazy ass hoe and rather rewatch marvel movies than write actual stories. Also does anyone wants to be tagged when I post stuff like that? I am not sure how these things work (Like tag-lists and such). ♥♥♥

Peter is Tony’s biological child. That’s it. That’s the whole plot. 


- It takes a lot of convincing and promises of two whole good-night stories instead of one, to make Peter stay at the Kindergarten the first day.

- He’s a shy kid and spends the first couple of days looking at books all by himself. The teachers try to get him to play with other kids, but he refuses.

- The first day he goes up to on of the Kindergartners and asks “I finished looking at the books, miss. Will my babbo pick me up now?”. She’s quite impressed with the kid’s word choices. 

- They often ask him to sit with them at the tables and encourage him to contribute to the board games or puzzles. 

- At lunch he ends up sitting next to a very talkative boy named Ned and Ned’s friend Flash. Flash is a loud and rude boy, who often destroys toys and puts to much pressure on his pencils when he draws, he’s also two years older than Peter. 

- Flash asks him about his Mommy and Daddy. Peter tells him proudly about his Babbo and about all the cool robots he builds. Flash makes fun of him for calling his father such a stupid name. The girl Peter never talked to before, shoves Flash and tells him that he should “stop being a mean slug!!”. Peter thinks her name might be MJ.

- In the first couple of weeks Peter’s only motivation to go to Kindergarten is that, no matter what, his father will always pick him up afterward and smoother him in cuddles, hugs and kisses. 

- On their way home to the Stark Tower, Peter always ends up in his father’s lap in the backseats. He sometimes falls asleep and drools all over Tony’s expensive suits. Tony’s PA Andrea makes always a fuss about the ruined jackets but Tony couldn’t care less as long as his son feels comfortable and safe. 

- Tony lets Peter pick his own outfits every morning. One day Peter picks bright red pants, which are difficult to open. He never asks for help when he needs to use the bathroom in Kindergarten, and ends up peeing himself. 

- Ned finds him crying in one of the bathroom stalls. He offers Peter his extra pair of pants, which are way too big on his small frame and throws the soiled pants into the trashcan. 

- Tony thinks he’s getting old when he asks his son about his pants when he picks him up, which, he’s pretty sure, were bright red and in his size. “Babbo I don’t have red pants, I pinky promise!”

These are just some headcanons from my collection of headcanons that never made it into a real fanfiction because I am a lazy ass hoe and rather rewatch marvel movies than write actual stories. Also does anyone wants to be tagged when I post stuff like that? I am not sure how these things work (Like tag-lists and such). ♥♥♥

blog.name: ao3feed-pepperony
blog.title: Pepperony
blog.description:
Marvel comic and movie verse fan works from AO3.
_____
ao3feedmonster@gmail.com

title: How The Mighty Fall
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Hzm9m8

by Meep_Morp

Since his duel against Toomes on Coney Island, Peter’s life has settled down considerably. May knows about his double life and accepts it (mostly). Tony has welcomed him back, and given him more independence as New York’s Spider-Man.

One night during patrol he crosses paths with Connor, a teenager who has Extremis in his blood and answers to the wrong kind of people. Though Tony is quick to distrust him, Peter finds himself reluctant to follow his mentor’s lead, and a bond develops between the two boys. Their relationship is further complicated when Connor’s former master, Negative, makes it a personal mission to destroy them both in his quest for power.

Taking down a superpowered psychopath? Tough, but Peter isn’t going to back down.

Stopping Tony from blasting his first potential boyfriend into space? He might need a miracle for that.

Words: 5370, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Original Male Character(s), Martin Li, May Parker (Spider-Man), Karen (Spider-Man: Homecoming), Hammerhead (Spider-Man), Ned Leeds, Michelle Jones, Flash Thompson, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Pepper Potts, Happy Hogan, Jocasta (Marvel), Mallen (Marvel), Arthur Parks | Living Laser, Wendy Conrad | Bombshell, Kali Elizi | Calypso, Silver Sablinova, Silvio Manfredi, Rhino (Marvel), Liz Allan
  • Relationships: Peter Parker/Original Male Character(s), Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Michelle Jones & Ned Leeds & Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: Slow Burn, Fluff, Angst, Fluff and Angst, Action/Adventure, Peter Parker Needs a Hug, Canon-Typical Violence, mostly - Freeform, Blood and Injury, at times - Freeform, and also a smidge of, Torture, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Hurt Peter Parker, Hurt Tony Stark, Hurt May Parker (Spider-Man), Implied/Referenced Homophobia, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Minor Character Death, BUT ALSO THERE IS, First Dates, First Kiss, Bisexual Peter Parker, Lesbian Michelle Jones, Gay Male Character, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Protective Tony Stark, Awesome Pepper Potts, James “Rhodey” Rhodes is a Good Bro, Coming Out, Precious Peter Parker, Ned Leeds is a Good Bro, Michelle Jones Is a Good Bro, Supportive May Parker (Spider-Man), Worried May Parker (Spider-Man), Redemption, Irondad Big Bang, Fluff and Hurt/Comfort, Humor, this fic basically has everything, except smut, however there is one instance of, Implied Sexual Content, Buckle up kids, I’m gonna make you feel things, I hope, Post-Spider-Man: Homecoming, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Rating May Change, For Violence, Jewish Peter Parker


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Hzm9m8

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Early mornings
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2W09Nr8

by Shalashaskitty

“I’m fine.” He chuckled after coughing again. “I just- Nice shirt you got there.”

The sorcerer, confused looked down and felt his cheeks heat up in embarrassment. Stark Industries was written in big letters, he wished he had his sling ring so he could portal himself away.

Words: 1025, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Family is made by us ♡

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Stephen Strange
  • Relationships: Tony Stark/Stephen Strange
  • Additional Tags: Love Confessions, Domestic, Fluff and Humor, tiniest bit of angst, no need to read the previous works!


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2W09Nr8
